house_value_prediction.ingest_data.feature_engineering(housing, strat_train_set)[source]

Does feature engineering on the dataset

Parameters:

  • housing (Dataframe) – The data that is to be used in model creation.

  • strat_train_set (Dataframe) – The train dataset

Returns:

The modified housing dataframe for model training housing_labels (Series): The target labels data

Return type:

housing (Dataframe)

house_value_prediction.ingest_data.fetch_housing_data(housing_url='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ageron/handson-ml/master/datasets/housing/housing.tgz', housing_path='F:\\Training\\GIT\\mle-training\\datasets\\housing')[source]

Downloads and extracts the housing dataset.

Parameters:

  • housing_url (str) – URL of the housing dataset to download.

  • housing_path (str) – Local directory path where the dataset should be stored.

Returns:

The function doesn’t return a value, but it downloads and extracts the dataset.

Return type:

None

house_value_prediction.train.random_forest(housing_prepared, housing_labels, strat_test_set, imputer, dataset_location)[source]

Develops Random Forest Model

Parameters:

  • housing_prepared (Dataframe) – The training data

  • housing_labels (Series) – The label data

  • strat_test_set (Dataframe) – Split from housing dataset for testing

  • imputer (SimpleImputer) – The imputer function to deal with missing data

  • dataset_location (str) – The location where the dataset is stored

Returns:

The Decision Tree Model y_test (Series): The label column value

Return type:

final_model (sklearn.tree._classes.DecisionTreeRegressor)
